attributes.action: Close schools for 2 months until the new covid variant stops spreading
attributes.additional_details: As there is a new variant for covid children may catch it as they are in class with several other children as well and to ensure their safety schools and other places of education should close for another 2 months until less people catch this new covid variant in order to keep our children safe
attributes.background: Close schools for 2 months until the new covid variant stops spreading so that children can be safe and stay far away from other children in their class who may also have the new variant covid

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599364
